meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Anand Kandaswamy Ashley Phillips Erica Irving Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7620.

td.p: Anand Kandaswamy, an economist from Washington, D.C.
Ashley Phillips, a homemaker and home-schooling mom from Lantana, Texas
Erica Irving, a web developer from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,801)

tr.td: YOU GOT SOME REAL BIRTHSTONES, MAN
CONTEMPORARIES
LA LA LAND
MODERN LINGO
MUSEUMS
THAT MOVIE HAD NO SEQUEL
(Alex: We'll give you three movies. You tell us which of the three never had a sequel.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'For June, it\'s these before swine (& they look lovely on you, dear!)')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: For June, it's these before swine (& they look lovely on you, dear!)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'The last Mamluk sultan of Egypt was hanged in 1517, the same year he is said to have hung his 95 theses on a church door')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The last Mamluk sultan of Egypt was hanged in 1517, the same year he is said to have hung his 95 theses on a church door

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
